subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise scored 2:38 into the extra period to beat the Montreal Canadiens, 2-1. Each of the Devils’ six previous non-regulation games this season were decided by shootout.
snippet: Zach Parise scored 2:38 into the extra period to beat the Montreal Canadiens, 2-1. Each of the Devils’ six previous non-regulation games this season were decided by shootout.
